tasks.check: deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno check **/*.ts && deno check **/*.tsx
tasks.deploy: deno task build && deno task manifest && deno task preview && deno task update
tasks.deploy:prod: deno task build && deno task manifest && deno task preview --prod && deno task update
tasks.deploy:prod:force: deno task build && deno task manifest && deno task preview --prod --force && deno task update
tasks.deploy:prod:force:skip: deno task build && deno task manifest && deno task preview --prod --force --skip && deno task update
tasks.deploy:prod:skip: deno task build && deno task manifest && deno task preview --prod --skip && deno task update
